106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 sys_hub_step_instance 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:04 false e00f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcb87 1 false 7574b5e3dbf4d050cb24431e13961986 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 sys_hub_step_instance e00f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcb87 600 sys_variable_value 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 b00f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcbaf 0 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { // Create the DateTime objects for the comparisons var cooldown_end = new GlideDateTime(inputs.last_updated) cooldown_end.addSeconds(inputs.cooldown_end_seconds) var grace_period = new GlideDateTime(inputs.last_updated) grace_period.addSeconds(inputs.grace_period_seconds) //Status: -1 for grace period, 0 for cooldown period, 1 for after cooldown. //This is similar to the .compareTo() method. //(Doing it this way because I can't figure out how to reference a choice in another flow in this action) var now = new GlideDateTime() if(now.compareTo(grace_period) == -1) { outputs.status = -1} else if (now.compareTo(cooldown_end) == 1) { outputs.status = 1 } else { outputs.status = 0 } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b sys_hub_step_instance e00f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcb87 400 sys_variable_value 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 fc0f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcbae 0 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 application e00f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcb87 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 b80f464f1b7194104be764e8bc4bcbae 0 3244578 2020-07-09 01:06:05 var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7
